about_the_game:
Halloween is coming to your bakery! Embrace all the spooky and cute things autumn has to offer this time of year. Put out jack-o-lanterns and candy bowls for Halloween and bake pumpkin bread muffins for fall.


Get your bakery ready in time for the influx of trick or treaters—I mean customers—you're about to receive! Put up bats, banners, spiders, candy cutouts and more to make your shop the spookiest in town.


Discover all the fun Halloween baked goods from creepy cupcakes, sweet sugar cookies, scary-good cakes, festive donuts and so much more!


As you bake and sell festive recipes you'll earn 'Halloween Tickets' that you can collect and spend in the Halloween Shop.


Spend your tickets to unlock Halloween recipes, pumpkins, candy bowls and wallpapers!


Put out a refillable candy bowl for your customers to spread the Halloween spirit! Choose between 4 spooky and fun designs.


You can't make caramel apples without the melted caramel! Play with seasonal ingredients including pumpkin puree, candy corn, craft supplies (for spooky cakes of course!), caramel pieces, and spooky sprinkles.


Included in the Halloween pack is a collection of autumn themed banners, cutouts, and of course recipes to bake!
detailed_description:
Halloween is coming to your bakery! Embrace all the spooky and cute things autumn has to offer this time of year. Put out jack-o-lanterns and candy bowls for Halloween and bake pumpkin bread muffins for fall.


Get your bakery ready in time for the influx of trick or treaters—I mean customers—you're about to receive! Put up bats, banners, spiders, candy cutouts and more to make your shop the spookiest in town.


Discover all the fun Halloween baked goods from creepy cupcakes, sweet sugar cookies, scary-good cakes, festive donuts and so much more!


As you bake and sell festive recipes you'll earn 'Halloween Tickets' that you can collect and spend in the Halloween Shop.


Spend your tickets to unlock Halloween recipes, pumpkins, candy bowls and wallpapers!


Put out a refillable candy bowl for your customers to spread the Halloween spirit! Choose between 4 spooky and fun designs.


You can't make caramel apples without the melted caramel! Play with seasonal ingredients including pumpkin puree, candy corn, craft supplies (for spooky cakes of course!), caramel pieces, and spooky sprinkles.


Included in the Halloween pack is a collection of autumn themed banners, cutouts, and of course recipes to bake!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Baker Business 3 - Halloween Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 700 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Invoke the Halloween spirit and invite autumn into your bakery. Bake spooky recipes, decorate your bakery for the season, hand out candy to your customers and spend tickets in the Halloween shop!
